Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: 'Actually, I have. In truth, everything about this world seems so...'

Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: 'Yes, actually.' Huh. Honestly she's making a lot of sense...

Name: Ares-Sama
Story: 'I see... Not many mortals share our beliefs on this matter. It is good to know you are enlightened at least. You see, I wish to erase this world and reshape it in my image.'

Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: Ares-Sama's cheeks turn red in a flash. Could this be my moment?
Choices: Do you wanna go to the dance?
